page.title: 04A day in the life of Helen.
page.content: Every morning I get up and get dressed for school. After breakfast I get in the car and go to school. School starts at 9 o'clock. The teacher takes the registers and then we have assembly. After assembly we do maths. We have playtime at 10:30. After playtime we do some work. The bell goes at 12:00 when we have lunch. Lunch time finishes at 1:15. We go in and read quietly. After reading we do some more work. The bell goes at 3:00 for Bases 1 and 2 to go home and at 3:30 we go home. When I get home I go to play with Faye who lives near me. On Tuesdays I go to Brownies in Much Wenlock. On Wednesdays I go to ballet classes at the Sports Centre in Bridgnorth and on Thursdays I go to gymnastics at the Sports Centre in Much Wenlock. At the weekend we go shopping and I play with my friends.
